strategy: Ork Armeen haben einen Strategiewert von 3.
Initiative: All Verbände haben eine Initiativewert von 3+.
usage: Unlike the very rigid Verbände used by the Imperium, Ork Verbände vary widely in both size und composition. The rules für creating Ork Verbände reflect this. The most common type of Ork formation is the warband. Other more specialised Verbände do exist, such as Kults of Speed und Blitz Brigades. The different types of Ork Verbände you may choose are shown on the army list that follows. The army list includes the following information:

Units - The units that make up the formation. An Ork player can choose to double oder triple the number of units in the formation if he wishes. A formation with double the normal number of units is called a Big formation, und a formation with drei times the normal number of units is called a ’Uge formation.

Erweiterungen - An Ork formation may include any of the extra units listed in the Erweiterungen column. You may include any number of extra units in a formation unless it is specifically noted otherwise. If there is a limitation then the limit is doubled für a Big formation und tripled für a ’Uge formation. Für example, a Normal sized Kult of Speed can include 0–1 Oddboy, a Big Kult of Speed can include 0–2, und a ’Uge Kult of Speed can include 0–3. All of the core, extra, und free units in an Ork formation Zählt als being part of eine large formation. The different units may not move off on their own.
Cost - Most Ork Verbände have drei values: Normal, Big und 'Uge. If the formation only has eine cost then it may not be increased in size.

formations.units: Zwei Bosse, sechs Boys, zwei Grotz
